headline: Take Back The Night - Official Trailer
sentences: Jane's efforts intensify, but her troubling history of drug use and mental illness bubbles to the surface causing her family, community, and authorities to question the authenticity of her account.
The movie stars Emma Fitzpatrick (The Social Network, In Time), Angela Gulner (Glow), Jennifer Lafleur (Big Little Lies, Billions), and Sibongile Mlambo (Teen Wolf, Lovecraft Country).
Finding herself the victim of a violent monster attack, Jane launches a vigilante campaign to hunt the beast that tried to kill her.
Suddenly alone in her fight, Jane starts to doubt her own memory of the attack...to doubt if Monster exists at all.
Take Back The Night, directed by Gia Elliot, opens in select theaters and digital platforms on March 4, 2022.
It is written by Emma Fitzpatrick and Gia Elliot.
